name: Marietta's Apartments & Studios

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved our stay at marietta's studio, a separte property from her main building. It was private and elegantly decorated. The room was kept spotless with a thorough cleaning every day - I mean thorough, bathroom scrubbed, floors swetp and mopped, kitchen cleaned. Unlike other studio rooms, we had a full separte kitchen with a 2 burner cooktop as well as convection oven. Shops were close by for mini market, bank and bakery. Bed was a king size pillow top mattress - very comfortable. Roof top balcony was very nice with large umbrella and 2 chairs - stairs are steep to get to the rooftop, but if no mobility problems very nice. Bathroom also has 3 steps down to get into it, so again if mobility is an issue Room had large room safe, able to fit small laptop. Marietta was full of information on the island and very willing to help at any time.
reviews.title: Marietta is a gem, studio room was spotless!

reviews.text: We would highly recommend marietta's to anyone wanting a local feel within the maze of streets that are Mykonos. No wifi at this location but you can get wifi at her other property near little venice. This was the only drawback to our accommodation, but otherwise excellent! Marietta will meet you at the airport/port and take you back upon request - free.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: I stayed at the triple room. The view was just AMAZING and the location was all we hoped for. Marietta is a warm and friendly person who went beyond her obligations in order to make our stay the dream vacation. She even took us to the beach on our last day since there were no buses. It trully is like having somewhere to stay on Mykonos where you are not a tourist but a friend. 100% Recommendable. Plus it is cleaner than my own house haha
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the triple room with balcony. The room is clean and have nice sea view. Marietta was quite busy but very kind to us. The location is prefect, very close to the town and have a lot of nice shops & restaurants around.
reviews.title: Just perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We contacted Marietta while coming across from Samos. She answered our email promptly and was waiting at the port to pick us up. This woman is 100% committed to your comfort. Since we arrived she has bent over backwards for us and other guests to ensure our stay is a pleasant one. And it has been. She sat with us on the verandah overlooking Little Venice and went over the map, showing us the best places to eat and buy supplies. There's no pretence here - she genuinely recommends these places.
reviews.title: Home away from home in Mykonos
PERFECT
reviews.text: Besides the perfect location, beautifull view, and VERY clean room; the best thing about Marietta's Appartment & Studio is Marietta herself. You feel at home the moment she welcomes you. Our luggage didn't arrive so she picked it up at the airport the next morning at 6:30 AM. The rooms have everything you need; fridge, cooker, tostimachine, etc.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will definitely go back to Marietta.
reviews.title: Marietta is the best host ever!!!

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed in Marietta´s Apartments & Studios for three nights and we did not want to leave. Marietta picked us up from the airport with a great smile and took us to one of her great rooms. Everything was so clean, well kept and beautifully decorated. The location is amazing because you are in the old town but in a quiet street and the beds at Marietta´s are the best! So comfortable... We woke up everyday with a smile in our face. The day we left Mykonos, Marietta picked us up at 5:45 am and took us to the airport. We have only great things to say about Marietta and her rooms and we recommend them to anyone who is looking for a clean, lovely place to stay and for great customer service. I wish all host were like Marietta. She is one of a kind!
reviews.title: The perfect apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment is small but perfectly formed. The small kitchen and bathroom are well equipped and cleaner than any other apartment I have ever stayed in. Marietta was very friendly, easily accessible and gave good recommendations.
reviews.title: Our best experience on the Greek Islands

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you have difficulty walking then this is probably not the apartment for you as it's up quite a few stairs...however, then Mykonos is probably not for you either.
reviews.title: The best sunset view in town

reviews.text: we were me and my friend, the apartment we had was situated in a tipical building of myknos, very nice with airconditioning, clean and with a big bed. the cleaning lady was perfect, every day she cleaned everything, included the dishes! Marietta was great, puntual in picking us up, and punctual in driving us back to the airport at the end of the vacation. she even dropped us to buy some food with the car!
reviews.title: awesome for mykonos

reviews.text: the apartment is in the centre of myknos, you have all the bars, discos, restaurants, shops, rental and the bus station few steps from you!
reviews.title: The best!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 amazing nights in Mykonos. Our room was adorable and the view from the terrace was excellent! Marietta went above and beyond to make our stay memorable and comfortable. She picked us up from the airport, helped us rent quads and even took us to a store to buy a CD player. We had an issue with our ferry tickets and she got our money back for us and helped us book new ferry tickets so we could stay an extra day. Amazing! The apartments are in a beautiful area between Little Venice, and the Windmills. Stay here!
reviews.title: Great Location, Great roof terrace!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you Marietta for everything! Nicole and Vicky!
reviews.title: a fantastic place to stay in Mykonos
PERFECT ACCOMODATION
reviews.text: We loved staying at Marietta's. She picked us up from the Airport and we were met with a great room, very clean and comfortable.

We were greeted as old friends when Marietta met us at the airport and we were wrapped in this wonderful sense of friendship throughout our 3 day stay. Marietta is the most vivacious, generous host you could possibly hope to meet. Her rooms / studios are in a stunning location - the magnificent view from the balcony of Little Venice & the windmills makes it the perfect spot for a glass or 2 of vino. The room known as "Peter's room" is particularly lovely - our rooms were very comfortable and simply furnished. Marietta dropped us at the ferry early one morning & there were tears as she said farewell to "my dears".
reviews.title: Marietta is Mykonos

reviews.text: I was on Mykonos from Sept. 21st until Oct.1st.. For some days I had to stay in the beautiful BALCONY-Room which is very nice decorated, with a fridge, hairdryer, safe-box and a beautiful new bathroom. There is a fantastic view to the sea, also from the bed ! How can a day start better after opening the eyes and look to the blue sea ?
reviews.title: Staying in MARIETTA`s rooms - and your holidays become perfect !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The other days I spent in the same house but in the VERANDA-Room which is also very beautiful decorated, also with a fridge, hairdryer, safe-box and a bathroom with a window.
reviews.title: Can't imagine a better place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From this room I could reach the roof-terrace with a fantastic view - overlooking the sea and the town !! I wouldn`t leave this wonderful place !
reviews.title: Great stay with friends.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: These rooms were well-groomed, centrally located, next to the famous windmills, but very quiet.
reviews.title: Amazing stayn in Mykonos

aka: Marietta`s Apartments & Studios Hotel Mykonos Town
